name: E-Commerce E2E Tests
description: Newman configuration for E2E testing of microservices

scripts.test:e2e:local: newman run ecommerce-e2e-collection.json -e local-environment.json --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/newman-report.json
scripts.test:e2e:local:verbose: newman run ecommerce-e2e-collection.json -e local-environment.json --reporters cli,json,htmlextra --reporter-json-export results/newman-report.json --reporter-htmlextra-export results/newman-report.html --verbose
scripts.test:e2e:minikube: newman run ecommerce-e2e-collection.json -e minikube-environment.json --reporters cli,json,htmlextra --reporter-json-export results/newman-report.json --reporter-htmlextra-export results/newman-report.html --delay-request 1000
scripts.test:e2e:minikube:quick: newman run ecommerce-e2e-collection.json -e minikube-environment.json --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/newman-report.json
scripts.test:e2e:pipeline: newman run ecommerce-e2e-collection.json -e pipeline-environment.json --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/newman-report.json --delay-request 2000

author: E-Commerce Team
